overview: Various recordings with legendary guitarist Randy Rhoads, including: After Hours: Rochester, NY, 28th April 1981 & MTV Special 1981: MTV’s Best New Talent Award. Include The Palladium Theater: New York, NY, 2nd May 1981.After Hours: Rochester, NY, 28th April 1981 & MTV Special 1981: MTV’s Best New Talent Award. Include The Palladium Theater: New York, NY, 2nd May 1981.
title: Randy Rhoads – Six String God
